A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw it today with my kids.  I'm giving it 1.5 stars only because the action and the space battles were awesome as always... but the story is simply meh.  So many things that didn't make sense or left unexplained.  Some points it felt like Batman vs Superman again.  Characters being killed off Game of Thrones style.  Catering to the Asian movie market.  It felt like Disney is pushing this for the younger generations to build a future cash cow and no longer cares about us 40+ year old farts.  Not going to waste my time or money on the next one.   It's been a fun ride RIP Star Wars 1977-2017
